topic.title: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (RADIOTHERAPY TREATMENT EPISODE)
topic.shortdesc: DECISION TO TREAT DATE (RADIOTHERAPY TREATMENT EPISODE) is the date that a decision was taken to treat a PATIENT's condition with a RADIOTHERAPY TREATMENT MODALITY.
